pages.text: The $(mob)Ender Dragon Girl$() is a neutral monster that spawns in $(thing)The End$(). Like the $(l:minecraft_enderman)$(mob)Enderman$(), she is vulnerable to water, has an immunity to falling damage and web effects, and will teleport in combat. Although usually passive, she will retaliate if attacked or if a nearby $(mob)Enderman$() is provoked.
$(mob)Ender Dragon Girls$() drop $(item)Ender Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive random blocks from $(item)The End$().
$(mob)Ender Dragon Girl$() can drop a $(item)Ender Girl Egg$() on death. This item can be used to spawn a passive $(l:grimoireofgaia_ender_girl)$(mob)Ender Girl$() helper for the player.
